website_summaries.verdict: Simple is sometimes best. This plush is the perfect size for playing or taking on the road.
pros: A good choice if you don't want a musical toy
Stuffing includes beads to add weight, yet remains light enough for kids
cons: The small size may be great for kids, but it's smaller than the advertised 10 inches

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Super Simple FINatic!
customer_reviews.text: We are huge Super Simple fans in our house. We have all of their plush animals. They are super well made, very sturdy, and they hold up perfectly in the wash (this is a very big plus, considering Baby Shark goes on every adventure with my 1-year-old). Baby Shark is my 1-year-old's new, favorite toy. It looks just like the one in Super Simple's song, and he recognized it right away, and began singing the "Baby Shark" song. The toy came clean, my son ate Cheetos with Baby Shark, just before the photo. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Leftysrule

customer_reviews.title: If you are reading this you already have the Baby Shark song stuck in your head.
customer_reviews.text: It's a stuffed Baby Shark from the Youtube videos, my daughter loves it! I am reviewing this so it stops popping up. It is stuffed, soft, and looks just like it does online. Hopefully the Baby Shark song will be out of my head now.
customer_reviews.author: MyNameIsJay

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super soft!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves the Baby Shark videos more than anything, so when I saw this plush, I had to get it for her! It is very well made and very soft, she loves to cuddle it and have me make it 'swim' around her while she watches the video or me sing the song (she is 8 months old). I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T F

customer_reviews.title: Baby shark, doo doo doot doo doo doo doo!
customer_reviews.text: This plush turned out to be the perfect gift for my nephew who loves the "Baby Shark" song! The plush feels of high quality and it looks exactly like the picture (and the shark in the video). The baby shark has a good weight to it with some beads on the bottom of the plush, without being too heavy or cumbersome. My 8 month old nephew absolutely loves it and laughs and giggles whenever he sees it, despite not being able to talk yet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rhyner

customer_reviews.title: High-quality plush
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality plush. I bought it to replace a dearly beloved baby shark plush that had been torn apart by the neighbor's dog. When this arrived it was immediately obvious that the old one had been a knock-off. I am happy we now have a quality one. Kid dropped it in the mud a few days after we got it and it washed perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nmdfamily

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for price and size
customer_reviews.text: This is small but baby shark is my 18 month old favorite song ever. The video saves us from meltdowns a few times a week $18 is steep considering how small this is. She does love it and it seems to be well made
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wikum

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected. About the size of my hand. Which they are small but I was more expecting a tiny kid size plush. So I was extremely happy. My son loves this shark and associates it with his uncle (long story) so he was extremely happy when it arrived and it hasn't left his bed since.
customer_reviews.author: Fiver Goodier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for snuggling
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth what I paid for it. The Easter Bunny brought this and my "simple songs" obsessed two year old hasn't let it go. Perfect size for snuggling.
customer_reviews.author: soctrees

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Cute and cuddly. My Baby Shark obsessed, little grandson loves it, as does his older brother and sister. The product seems well made. Hopefully, it will stand up to a lot of cuddling.
customer_reviews.author: grannybeans

customer_reviews.title: No music , just a small stuffed animal .
customer_reviews.text: This was inferred that the shark had the baby shark music . I was terribly sad that it was just an overpriced small stuffed toy . Do not buy !
customer_reviews.author: Sally Gillam

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the cartoon and this was perfect. It is a smaller sized stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the cartoon and this was perfect. It is a smaller sized stuffed animal . you can roll it around because of shape. My 5 month old son loves grabbing the eyes and the mouth is open enough to "grab" him. He has a lot of fun playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super soft
customer_reviews.text: My son loves baby shark so I got him this plushie. It’s super soft and high quality. It’s the perfect size for my 21 month old to nuzzle on his cheek. It matches the Baby Shark on the version of the video created by Super Simple Songs, which I think is cuter than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Super Simple Song Fan Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. At first I felt it was a little smaller than expected for the price but when my daughter grabbed it she was so happy I feel it was money well spent. Great quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: Bartholomew Sciacca

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1yr old. He loves it and I love it looks just like the little video time. Ba....by...shark..doo..do..doo...do...do..doo.doo.do! Really great stuffed baby shark!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Scott

customer_reviews.title: For the baby shark obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and cute, would have been a plus if it played the super simple songs baby shark! *might want to move some of the stuffing around, it collects around the face and eyes
customer_reviews.author: Biancakarlsbarch

customer_reviews.title: I paid 20$ for this?????
customer_reviews.text: I’m so annoyed with this product. I’m only giving it one star because my kid loves it. He loves the baby shark video from simple Simon‘s so I decided to get him this I read the description and it says it’s like 10 inches by 6 inches. Buulllllllcrapppp. I haven’t gotten A tape measure out yet but I uploaded a picture of it compared to my hand. I cannot believe this little Stuffed animal is almost 20$!!!!! It’s almost extortion!
customer_reviews.author: Carolanne’s Cut

customer_reviews.title: Cute Plush Toy, but does not Sing the Song
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was my fault for not reading closely, but I thought it would play the song. I was reading so many different reviews, and ultimately decided on this one. I was sad it did not play the song, but hopefully the 1 year-old that I bought it for still enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo soft and very cute
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but I wish it had the song inside that would make it really cool! It’s soo much cuter in person and I was more excited to see this than my niece who is addicted to YouTube. This toy is really beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: Suarez Family

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cuddly, well-made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a two-year-old Super Simple Songs Baby Shark fan. He loves it! Very soft - made for cuddling. :) Very well made, and love the price.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Lover

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark. Do do do do do
customer_reviews.text: Been watching baby shark on youtube with my one year old. He holds it and moves it back and forth watching the baby shark. Looks to be excellent quality in should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Bucket

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. It was a little smaller than I expected for the price, but the perfect size for a 2-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Walker

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old was overjoyed. She carries around her "bay shark" and loves the video!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Small but exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but also very small...howete it was the perfect gift for my two year old. She has not stopped singing "baby shark do do" 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Love this baby Shark. Got it as table decor for my sons 2nd birthday theme and was so cute. He now sleeps with it every night and is one of his favorite toys. It’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: AList200

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Baby Shark obsessed 2 year old. He totes it around everywhere and he typically is not a fan of plush animals. I would recommend to any Super Simple fans.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is in love with Simple Songs and Baby Shark is his favorite. This toy is soft and cute and cuddly. He loves it and carries it around by the tail if he’s not hugging it. Great quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Jakubek

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it so much I had to buy another one due to baby losing it. Great stuffed animal but it’s small for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly higher quality than expected. Daughter loves it. Bead or something like it are on the bottom so it can stand up if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good size for his age
customer_reviews.text: My son (18 months) loves this shark. It appears as pictured. It's very soft. Seems to be a good size for his age. He can carry it around, but it's not so small as to get lost. My son runs to get it when the baby shark song comes on. He holds it up in the morning and says "do do do". We are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved baby shark ever since it came out!! Sooo cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mireya Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a baby shark...if you know what this is then you will buy it for your kids
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rebellato

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you don't want your kid sing the same song everyday LOL
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and is on his bed everyday since we got it, just like the one he see on TV, will keep singing the song
customer_reviews.author: Bing Yiu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My godson adores baby shark! I purchased it for him for his 2nd birthday. It fit perfectly in his arms and he wouldn’t let go!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Baby Shark fan so I bought this for him as a Christmas gift. He plays with it throughout the day and sleeps with it at night. I purchased the book "PinkFong Baby Shark" to go along with it -- a great combination of entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: C. Solis

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter fell in love with twinkle twinkle little star the first time she heard it when she was 7 months old. So we got her the owl and star plush. She loves owlie. Shes almost 3 now and her and her cousin recently got hooked on baby shark so we had to grab her this. She loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: JugDakGus

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Loved it came in a week earlier than expected I didn’t think it was going to come with music but it did the only thing was it plays the original baby shark song instead of the super simple version but other than that it’s great quality!

customer_reviews.title: So cute. Perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the song and I had to get her this and she absolutely loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shark!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2-year old for his baby shark birthday party. He's soft and stuffed perfectly. Toddler approved!

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark Plush Toy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler absolutely LOVES his baby shark plush toy! We love Super Simple Songs and were so happy to find a matching baby shark to go along with all of the songs and videos we play at home. Thank you for this wonderful toy! Super soft and cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shark...do do da do do ta do!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loved the baby shark plushy. It looks just like, the YouTube baby shark video. I gave it to him for his first birthday. I was very satisfied!!

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: There's a little bit of bean bag material in the bottom so that it can stand erect. Kid loves it. 4 stars only because it's kind of expensive for a small toy.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely plush toy
customer_reviews.text: Baby shark is really popular now, and my granddaughter loves this toy.

customer_reviews.title: My son is obsessed.

The product is as cute as the animation in person and it’s the perfect size for a youngster to carry around with them. I would definitely order this again.

Not only are we excited because he's the real one from the video, but this dude is so softy! If you love the baby shark video, you will love this baby shark.

product_meta.title: Super Simple Baby Shark Official Plush
product_meta.description: Super soft and huggable Baby Shark packaged in a poly bag. Official plush toy for the beloved YouTube video from Super Simple Songs, Baby Shark. 10 in. long, 5 in. tall, 6.4 in. wide. Beaded base. Made exclusively for Super Simple by leading soft toy maker, Mary Meyer Corporation, Baby Shark is safe for children of any age.
feature_bullets: Official plush toy for the beloved YouTube video from Super Simple Songs, Baby Shark
10 in. long, 5 in. tall, 6.4 in. wide. Beaded base.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars241 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
